articles.description: Ferrari will reveal the car that Carlos Sainz and Charles Leclerc will get the honour of driving in this season’s 2022 F1 World Championship on February 17.
articles.content:
Ferrari will reveal the car that Carlos Sainz and Charles Leclerc will get the honour of driving in this seasons 2022 F1 World Championship on February 17.
